statements: SELECT * FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT id, service_type FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE performance_metric_1 > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE service_type = '5G Type A';
SELECT performance_metric_1, performance_metric_2 FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT id, client_id, service_type FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE performance_metric_1 < performance_metric_2;
SELECT * FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE client_id = 100 ORDER BY performance_metric_1 DESC, performance_metric_2 ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_id, service_type, SUM(performance_metric_1) AS total_metric_1 FROM 5g_service_metrics GROUP BY client_id, service_type ORDER BY total_metric_1 DESC;
SELECT * FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE performance_metric_1 > 50 OR performance_metric_2 < 30;
SELECT client_id, service_type, AVG(performance_metric_1) AS avg_metric_1, AVG(performance_metric_2) AS avg_metric_2 FROM 5g_service_metrics GROUP BY client_id, service_type;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS total_services FROM 5g_service_metrics GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_services > 2;
SELECT * FROM SLA WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT service_name, agreement_date FROM SLA ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM SLA WHERE service_name = 'Service A';
SELECT service_name, timestamp FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SLA WHERE client_id = 100 ORDER BY agreement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM SLA GROUP BY service_name HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE value > 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_id, service_name, MAX(value) as max_value FROM SLA JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON SLA.sla_id = PerformanceMetrics.service_id GROUP BY client_id, service_name;
SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM SLA WHERE agreement_date > '2021-12-01';
SELECT * FROM 5g_service_agreements;
SELECT agreement_type, client_id, sla_description FROM 5g_service_agreements ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_id, agreement_type, sla_metric FROM 5g_service_agreements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, measurement_unit FROM 5g_performance_metrics WHERE metric_id > 100;
SELECT client_name, company_name FROM 5g_clients WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, agreement_type, sla_metric FROM 5g_service_agreements;
SELECT client_name, contact_email, company_name FROM 5g_clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT agreement_type, COUNT(*) AS agreement_count FROM 5g_service_agreements GROUP BY agreement_type;
SELECT c.client_name, s.agreement_type FROM 5g_clients c JOIN 5g_service_agreements s ON c.id = s.client_id;
SELECT * FROM 5g_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SLA_metrics;
SELECT service_name, service_level_agreement FROM SLA_metrics ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE industry = 'Technology' AND client_name LIKE '%Inc%';
SELECT metric_name, metric_type, metric_value FROM Performance_metrics WHERE metric_type = 'KPI';
SELECT client_id, client_name, contact_person FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_level_agreement FROM SLA_metrics WHERE metric_value > 10 ORDER BY service_name ASC
SELECT client_name, industry, contact_person FROM Clients WHERE industry = 'Technology' OR industry = 'Finance' ORDER BY client_name DESC
SELECT metric_name, metric_type, metric_value FROM Performance_metrics WHERE metric_type IN ('Latency', 'Throughput') ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT client_id, client_name, industry, contact_person FROM Clients JOIN Contracts ON Clients.client_id = Contracts.client_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY client_id
SELECT service_name, service_level_agreement, metric_value FROM SLA_metrics WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY metric_value
SELECT * FROM ServiceLevelAgreements;
SELECT client_id, start_date, end_date FROM ServiceLevelAgreements WHERE sla_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM Services WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT network_name, region, service_id FROM 5GNetwork WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM Clients;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM Services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT network_name, region FROM 5GNetwork WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE latency_ms > 100 AND throughput_mb < 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT client_name, contact_phone FROM Clients JOIN Services ON Clients.client_id = Services.client_id;
